actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hippocampus makes one Bite attack and one Tail Slap attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (1d8+4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The hippocampus can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Shared Breath
special_abilities.desc: The hippocampus's gills pull more air from the water than the hippocampus needs, expelling the excess as bubbles down its neck and across its back. If an air-breathing creature is riding the hippocampus, these bubbles can provide that creature a supply of fresh air when the hippocampus isn't in combat or traveling at a fast pace.
